attributes.action: give a public undertaking immediately to sack Peter Mandelson from the government if the Euro, as predicted, fails.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peter Mandelson demonstrated crass judgement by stating, this week, while the euro was under extreme pressure because of the 'PIGS' problem, that 'the euro has been a success'.  It cannot be that somebody who is as unworldly wise enough so as not to keep his big mouth shut and not to espouse absolute rubbish, is mentally capable of being a member of any government, even that of Gordon Brown's!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
